import { Container,Paper,Grid,Button ,FormControl} from "@mui/material" import React ,{useState} from "react" import { schoolIcon } from "../../Constant/Icon/icon" import { InputElement } from "../../Template/FECommon" export function CreateSchool(){ const [schoolDetails,setSchoolDetails]=useState({ syllabus:"", state:"", district:"", location:"", schoolName:"", emailID:"" }) const handleInput=(event)=>{ setSchoolDetails({ ...schoolDetails, [event.target.name]:event.target.value }) } const {syllabus,state,district,location,schoolName,emailID}=schoolDetails return (
) }
